story:
Once upon a time, in a beautiful village in the heart of China, there lived a kind and gentle girl named Li Mei. She was known throughout the village for her love of nature and her ability to communicate with animals.

One day, Li Mei discovered a wounded bird in her backyard. Its wing was hurt and it couldn't fly. Li Mei took the bird in and cared for it, feeding it and keeping it safe until its wing healed.

As the bird got stronger, Li Mei would take it outside and watch it hop around. She would talk to the bird, telling it stories of the village and its people. The bird seemed to understand Li Mei and would chirp along, as if it was responding to her words.

One day, Li Mei decided to take the bird to the top of the nearby mountain. It was a long and difficult journey, but Li Mei was determined to help the bird fly again. When they reached the top, Li Mei held the bird in her hands and whispered, "It's time for you to fly again."

The bird looked at Li Mei, then spread its wings and took off into the sky. Li Mei watched in amazement as the bird soared higher and higher, until it was just a small dot in the sky.

From that day on, Li Mei spent her days caring for the animals in her village and sharing her love of nature with everyone she met. And every time she saw a bird flying in the sky, she was reminded of the special bond she shared with the bird she had healed.

Li Mei's kindness and compassion had not only helped heal a wounded bird but also had brought joy to the people in her village. And so, Li Mei's reputation as a kind and gentle soul spread far and wide.

And that, my dear daughter, is the end of the story. Remember, like Li Mei, be kind and compassionate to all the creatures you encounter. And who knows, you might just make a special friend along the way. Goodnight, my dear. Sweet dreams.
